HTitle: AI applied to make farming smart
AUTitle: Each year 40% of the crop production is lost..
AUDescription: Helping farmers was an obvious choice for us since they are the guardians of our survival. Our goal is to help farmers to maximise their production by better fighting pests & pathogens. This will allow the farmers to have a decent living better in line with their hard work and allow them to produce enough food to feed the growing world population.
step1title: Take picture(s) of the infected area
step2title: Get the real-time diagnosis powered by AI
step3title: Our qualified agronomists will prepare you a personalized treatment
step4title: Apply the treatment & Save your crop!
OurTeamTitle: A Genuine Team of Game Changers
OurTeamQuote: " Talent wins games, but teamwork and intelligence win championships. "
